title.rendered: Virtual Fairs This Fall and Beyond

content.rendered:
As we look to the fall, it’s clear that virtual recruiting is here to stay. Learn how Handshake is enhancing the virtual fair experience for schools, students and employers, plus best practices on establishing your long term virtual strategy.

As mentioned in the webinar, we highly recommend checking out the Handshake blog for more best practices and trends around virtual engagement. We also recommend this blog post, which introduces our new DEI report templates.

For a summary of the virtual fair updates discussed in this webinar, check out our virtual fair release notes.

View all career center webinars

Correction: One of the multi-school fair quotes in this webinar is attributed to ViterboCollege—it should be attributed to Viterbo University.
